sourcesContent:
<template>
  <SidebarMenu
    :menu="menu"
    :collapsed="collapsed"
    @update:collapsed="updateCollapsed"
    @mounted="onMounted"
  />
</template>

<script>
import { SidebarMenu } from 'vue-sidebar-menu';
import 'vue-sidebar-menu/dist/vue-sidebar-menu.css';
import { nextTick } from 'vue';

export default {
  name: 'AppSidebar',
  components: {
    SidebarMenu,
  },
  props: {
    menu: {
      type: Array,
      required: true,
    },
    collapsed: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
  },
  methods: {
    updateCollapsed(newValue) {
      this.$emit('update:collapsed', newValue);
    },
    async onMounted() {
      await nextTick();
      // 在这里执行可能依赖于 DOM 渲染完成的逻辑
    }
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add your custom styles here */
</style>
